description:
Welcome to Email Hunting !

The main topic of this course is Email Hunting and more precisely, the web solutions available to guess, check and retrieve someone's email address.

What you'll learn during this course:

  • how to use email formats
  • how to deduce a company's email format
  • how to check someone's email
  • how to generate & check permutations
  • how to use Google Advanced Search operators
  • how to use LinkedIn Advanced Search operators

By the end of this course, you'll be able to use your newly developed Email Hunting skill to contact anyone relevant to your career path.

All of the lessons are screen recorded in HD 1080p so you can see everything I mention during the lectures (check out the free preview sections!) And there’s also a checklist at the end of each section with a link to every website you see in the videos. 

I’ll personally be answering any questions you have and I’ll be happy to provide links, resources and any help I can offer you in improving your understanding of Email Hunting.  I’ll also be updating the course every month with new tactics and approaches to Email Hunting so that you’re always up-to-date.

If you're looking to save hours of time, learn an invaluable skill and become a boss at finding emails, click Take This Course at the top right of the page and let's get started!
title: Email Hunting: Find Any Email Like A Boss
